original_title: Les Aventures d'Oswald : Le Lapin Chanceux
overview: Before Mickey there was Oswald the floppy-eared star of Walt Disney's first cartoon series. The Adventures of Oswald The Lucky Rabbit. Fun and mischievous, the cheerful rabbit's popularity quickly multiplies, and so did his shorts. Between 1927 and 1928, Disney created a bounty of legendary and rarely seen Oswald cartoons.
title: Les Aventures d'Oswald : Le Lapin Chanceux
